metadata.title: CVE-2019-10782 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: All versions of com.puppycrawl.tools:checkstyle before 8.29 are vulnerableto XML External Entity (XXE) Injection due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2019-9658.

criterions.comment: checkstyle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
